src_original: na cātrotpadyate kaścin maraṇaṃ nāpi kasyacit /

sarvākāravaropeto asecanakavigrahaḥ /  darśayet taṃ suśiṣyāya svādhiṣṭhānaṃ taducyate // Pk_3.25 //  iyameva hi saṃlakṣyā māyā nirdoṣalakṣaṇā /  māyaiva saṃvṛteḥ satyaṃ kāyaḥ sāmbhogikaśca saḥ // Pk_3.26 //
buddhatvaṃ vajrasattvatvaṃ sarvaiśvaryaṃ tathaiva ca // Pk_5.25 /
